name: DetailedEthnicity
title: Detailed ethnicity
description: The codes for the concepts "Unknown", "Asked but no answer", "other", and the 41 [CDC ethnicity codes](https://www.cdc.gov/phin/php/vocabulary) that are grouped under one of the 2 OMB ethnicity category codes.
